multitext.text: To play this game you require the latest version Flash Player. Please click the link below and follow the quick and simple installation instructions.
Note that any Jackpots are shown and paid in your account currency.
ONLY HIGHEST WIN PAYS PER LINE
WIN COMBINATIONS PAY LEFT TO RIGHT ONLY EXCEPT
PAYLINE WINS ARE MULTIPLIED BY THE LINE BET
MALFUNCTIONS VOID ALL PLAYS AND PAYS
THE LETTERS MUST APPEAR IN THAT ORDER
ON CONSECUTIVE REELS FROM LEFT TO RIGHT,
ROCKY FEATURE AVAILABLE IN MAIN GAME
YOUR GOAL IS TO CORRECTLY GUESS WHETHER
THE NEXT CARD WILL BE RED OR BLACK
AND RETURN TO THE MAIN GAME
ROCKY WILL FIGHT THE CHOSEN OPPONENT
FOR EVERY ROUND ROCKY WINS, YOU WIN A CASH PRIZE
ALL MATCHES END WITH A KNOCKOUT IN ROCKY`S FAVOR
IF A KNOCKOUT OCCURS EARLIER THAN THE 10TH ROUND,
ALL FOLLOWING ROUNDS ARE CONSIDERED TO BE WON
BY ROCKY AND YOU WIN ACCORDINGLY
THE KNOCKOUT BONUS CANNOT BE TRIGGERED
THE MAIN GAME WINS 15, 20 OR 25 FREE GAMES RESPECTIVELY
FREE GAMES ARE PLAYED WITH x2 MULTIPLIER
MORE FREE GAMES CAN BE WON, INFINITELY
EVERY ROUND ROCKY WINS AWARDS 3X TOTAL BET
EVERY ROUND ROCKY WINS AWARDS 3X TOTAL BET
PICK 1 OF 4 LIFE ELEMENTS FOR FREE GAMES

phrase.text: This bet is not currently available.
There has been an error retrieving your previous game, please refresh
You have exceeded the maximum possible winning limit for any one bet. Please change your bet or cashout.
Play for fun. If you would like to Play for Real, please log into or create an account.
You are part way through a game. Please click to resume.

ROCKY 5-Reel 25-Line Slots
Rocky’s objective is to obtain winning symbol combinations by spinning the reels.
TO PLAY THE GAME:
LINE BET Increase the ‘LINE BET’ by clicking this button. Once maximum LINE BET is reached, clicking the button again will reset the bet to the minimum LINE BET.
LINES * Clicking the ‘LINES’ button will activate paylines. Once all 25 paylines have been activated, clicking the button again will reset the paylines to one. Alternatively clicking the numbered and coloured buttons next to the reels will increase or decrease your paylines accordingly.
The ‘TOTAL BET’ display shows the line bet multiplied by the number of active paylines.
SPIN Clicking ‘SPIN’ spins the reels with the selected LINE BET and LINES.
BET MAX Clicking ‘BET MAX’ activates all the paylines and spins the reels.
INFO Click the ‘INFO’ button to view winning paylines and payout information. Scroll through INFO screens by using the left and right arrows. To view paylines click “SHOW PAYLINES”. To Exit the PAYTABLE click the ‘BACK’ button.
DISPLAY BOXES: LINES: Display’s the number of lines active. LINE BET: Display’s the amount staked per line. TOTAL BET: Display’s the total bet per game. WIN: Display’s the winning amount.
AUTO START There is an auto start function available that will start each spin automatically until either something occurs that requires your intervention or the number of set spins expires. Select your desired number of spins using the + and - buttons. Click ‘AUTO START’ to commence the spins. Click 'STOP' to cancel auto start.
ABOUT PAYOUTS:
* If two winning combinations occur on the same line, the higher of them is paid out. * Win combinations must occur from left to right. * The Wild Symbol is the Rocky symbol. It can stand for any other symbol excluding scatter and bonus to make the best possible winning combination. * There is a separate payout for 3 or more consecutive Wild Symbols on an active payline. * The Wild Symbol does not substitute to spell “ROCKY”. *Line Bet and Total Bet are different. The line bet shows how much you're betting on a single payline. The total bet shows how much you're spending in this game round. Payouts shown in the paytable are multiplied by the line bet, not by the total bet. If more than one active payline has a winning combination, the winnings are added up.
SCATTER SYMBOL:
* Scatter symbols do not have to occur on a particular payline. * Payout for scatter symbols is multiplied by the total Bet. * If there are 2 or more Scatters in the spin results, the payout earned is multiplied by the total bet and added to payline winnings. * If 3, 4 or 5 Scatter Symbols appear on the anywhere on the reels simultaneously 15, 20 or 25 Free Games are won respectively.
FREE GAMES *Free Game wins are doubled. * Click “CLICK TO START” to begin free spins. * Additional WILD symbols are added to the reels. * If 3 or more Scatter Symbols appear anywhere on the reels during free games, 15 additional free games are added with the same multiplier. * When Free Games have expired clicking continue will return you to the regular slot reels.
DISPLAY * SPINS LEFT – Indicates free spins remaining. * FREE GAMES WIN – Indicates current winnings from free spins. * Multiplier – Indicates the multiplier.
KNOCKOUT BONUS:* The Bonus Symbols are the White and Red boxing gloves with the word ‘BONUS’ on them. * The white glove only appears on reel #1 and the red on reel #5. * The Bonus Round is activated when the Bonus Symbols appear on the first and last reel. * Click ‘CLICK TO START’ which replaces the ‘SPIN’ to proceed to the Knockout Bonus. * Select an opponent for Rocky to fight. * Rocky and the chosen opponent will fight in the ring appearing in the middle of the screen, for 10 short rounds. * For every round won by Rocky, 3X the total bet of the spin that triggered the Knockout Bonus is awarded * All Matches end with a Knockout in Rocky's favour, if a knockout occurs before the 10th round all following rounds are considered a win. * The Knockout Bonus cannot be triggered during free games. * Knockout Bonus wins are added to the payline and Scatter wins. * If the Knockout Bonus and Free Games are simultaneously triggered, the knockout Bonus round will be played first. * Once all 10 rounds have been played click ‘CONTINUE’ on the score screen to return to the regular game.
ROCKY FEATURE *If the letters ‘R’, ’O’, ‘C’, ‘K’, ’Y’ appear in this order, from left to right, on consecutive reels, regardless of paylines, five times the total bet is awarded. *The Wild symbol does not substitute to spell ‘ROCKY’. *The Rocky Feature can be won during both main and free games
Malfunction voids all pays and plays. This game has a Return to Player of 95.02%.
